Identify each correction.
For each correction, provide a brief, clear description of the change

Original Text:
Around 185 million people live in the catchment area of the rivers that flow into the North Sea encompassing some highly industrialized areas .

Revised Text:
Around 185 million people live in the catchment area of the rivers that flow into the North Sea , encompassing some highly industrialized areas .
responses.response:

- **Added a comma after "North Sea"**: This comma is added to separate the independent clause "Around 185 million people live in the catchment area of the rivers that flow into the North Sea" from the dependent clause "encompassing some highly industrialized areas". This change improves the readability and clarity of the sentence.

question_values: Around 185 million people live in the catchment area of the rivers that flow into the North Sea encompassing some highly industrialized areas .
